attributes.action:
min sentence to be raised for child offenses
Hunt teams 2 be uses by all forces
attributes.additional_details:
We are the voice of the people
And there are many teams work that has resulted in bail
Also no conviction
The use of our evidence seems to come down to what area we are in
Life on the  register as these people can not and is medical evidence to state anything different
Therefore should remain there for life
attributes.background:
We are The children's pride 
A hunting group with proven convictions
We are campaigning for all credible teams work to be used by all forces
Life on sexual offenders
And tougher sentaces

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
